fullText: Tom Hollander gives a tour de force performance as Henry Carr in this witty revival that makes Stoppard's intellectual comedy feel surprisingly accessible and entertaining.
dtliExcerpt: Tom Hollander gives a tour de force performance as Henry Carr in this witty revival that makes Stoppard's intellectual comedy feel surprisingly accessible and entertaining.
